name: Yoda
description: The deceased former Grand Master of the Jedi, and Luke's wise former mentor, who appears as a Force-ghost.

name: Chewbacca
description: Han Solo's Wookiee partner and co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: Jedi whose coming of age and rise as a Jedi are portrayed in the original Star Wars trilogy. Son of Anakin Skywalker and Padm√© Amidala, and Leia Organa's twin brother.

name: BB-8
description: Poe Dameron's astromech droid in The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi.
